title: Schedule
description: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:active.title: Active
fhir:active.description: Whether this schedule record is in active use or should not be used (such as was entered in error).

fhir:serviceCategory.title: Service Category
fhir:serviceCategory.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.

fhir:serviceType.title: Service Type
fhir:serviceType.description: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment.

fhir:specialty.title: Specialty
fhir:specialty.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment.

fhir:name.title: Name
fhir:name.description: Further description of the schedule as it would be presented to a consumer while searching.

fhir:actor.title: Actor
fhir:actor.description: Slots that reference this schedule resource provide the availability details to these referenced resource(s).

fhir:planningHorizon.title: Planning Horizon
fhir:planningHorizon.description: The period of time that the slots that reference this Schedule resource cover (even if none exist). These cover the amount of time that an organization's planning horizon; the interval for which they are currently accepting appointments. This does not define a "template" for planning outside these dates.

fhir:comment.title: Comment
fhir:comment.description: Comments on the availability to describe any extended information. Such as custom constraints on the slots that may be associated.
